website_summaries.verdict: A very fun art kit of a unique type of project. Both boys and girls love this kind of art paper.
pros: Scratch-off sheet is smooth and works well
Comes with two scratchers and 20 sheets of scratch paper
Kids can make pictures with this kit without you having to worry about them coloring on anything
A good art kit for older kids
cons: This set will likely be used up quickly
The paper can only be used once and if they "over scratch" the black cover, they cannot fix it

customer_reviews.title: Best scratch paper - better than Melissa Doug - great value
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this set given as a gift to my kiddo for Christmas. It comes completely shrink wrapped so great to give as a gift. This is far better scratch art paper than what Melissa and Doug offers. Colors are truly rainbow and vibrant. Great samples included with stickers and a small holographic sample. Lots of stylus pencils for others to draw at same time. I will buy more as gifts. Great for little artists - and I guarantee adults will get it on fun as well.
customer_reviews.author: CC✨👩🏻‍🍳✨

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a creative use of time for many ages
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my artistic, crafty 12 year old nephew. He began using it within minutes of receiving it. He has spent a good amount of time creating his own drawings, writing messages, and just being an artist. The pages are big enough for multiple drawings and/or messages to fit on one page. The stickers that came along in the set were definitely young for a 12 year old boy. But free stickers are always useful for something. I honestly did not expect him to like this scratchpad as much as he does. So it was a pleasant surprise. I would definitely recommend for creative/artistic children of any age.
customer_reviews.author: mamato3

customer_reviews.title: Even more fun than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really know what to expect when I ordered these but they looked fun. Well, they're even more fun than they look! My daughter is really into coloring with colored pencils, markers, whatever. This is a creative addition to her repertoire of coloring materials. The only sort of bummer is the little black crumbs that come off of it when you use it. Have your dustbuster handy.
customer_reviews.author: B moore

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it, pages are big, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased four for the winter holidays: two for each of my kids, two for each of the cousins. All four cousins spent more time drawing in these pages than playing with any other toys they received for the holidays. They enjoyed it and it was simple and easy to use and the adults came by to try it out too! The only thing is the amount of black scratched-off stuff that collected next to the kids, but that is to be expected. It's still one of the cleanest art items that we have and can whip it out in the car or restaurant without creating a large mess.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: It's a Christmas present so it hasn't been used, but in looking forward to my niece using it. The package includes everything it says, with 3 wooden styluses and extra stickers. Not sure exactly what's in there since I haven't open the package but I can see those things. My son wants some now, too!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Mann

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: I had a few days of down time without a car and stuck at home with my kiddos so I ordered these off Amazon to keep them busy. They really enjoyed it and have made plenty of designs on them. I have a 6, 7 and 12 year old. All 3 of them used them and sat for a while, it kept them busy. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Carolh1026

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for birthday parties
customer_reviews.text: I always have a pack or two of these types of scratch pad paper in my "gifts" drawers! Makes a great gift for those birthday parties that you have to send your kids to that they "forgot" to tell you and you need something to take. My girls always have a great time with these scratch pads. We also take them on car rides so they have something to do that keeps them busy.
customer_reviews.author: CraftySam

customer_reviews.title: A handy fav!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son LOVES it. It makes me happy to give him one to use, and I bought a second to keep in the car for longer trips. I used to bring markers and a pad, but this way there are no caps to lose on the markers and he’s still able to make a colorful piece.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved this paper, she was immediately creating beautiful pictures. Only downside is the amount of black debris from the scratching. Better than glitter, I guess! I even did a picture that turned out really cute.
customer_reviews.author: rabidreader

customer_reviews.title: Very cute.
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty cute, my daughter will really like it, it is a bit thin, and I'm afaid she will use up all the pages the first day. But as far as quality go's, its worth the price. It came with 3 bamboo stylists ( pointed sticks) and a couple of sheets of stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffnsara

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I thought they would be poster size since they advertise as, "BIG" but they are 81/2 by 11” which is ok, my art classes were still able to use the kits, which were very nice
customer_reviews.author: Lizelle A Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for ages 4+
customer_reviews.text: The little angel I got this for absolutely loved it! Perfect for ages 4+ I love that it has one shiny/glittery half and one rainbow half. Both were a hit, she didn’t know which one she loved more. Worth every penny for that gigantic smile :)
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Consumer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased scratch-off sheets like this in the past from several different sources. This one is my favorite. I like how smooth it is with very little mess. The kids really enjoyed these.
customer_reviews.author: K. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to give as a Christmas gift and was a little embarrassed to give it. Glad I got it on sale because it definitely wasn’t worth the original price. It almost looks like a freebie sample you would get when buying something else. Don’t know how well it works since it was for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Julianna Bretado

customer_reviews.title: Love it, very fun for kids and adults!
customer_reviews.text: This is a bit old fashioned, meaning it's been around for awhile. Surprised my 10 yr old daughter with it and she absolutely loved it. It was a old idea brought back lol... Great price, fast shipping. Even I got to draw!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as a gift for a 5 year old. I am not sure how good it is but hoping he enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: LMM

customer_reviews.title: Neat idea
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids are nuts over this paper. The only caution is that it can really stain their clothes if they are wearing long sleeves when they are using it. I found that out the hard way & after trying many ways to get the stain out, it's not as bad but it's still there.
customer_reviews.author: Sue S.

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: My boys absolutely love this notebook! They can be very creative all on their own. ( I love it also!) The surprise gift of stickers and extra sheet of scratch paper was also a hit with the kids. They even took some of the smelly stickers, and a few pieces of scratch paper ( we cut one large piece down) to share with friends at school. The kids at school like it so well I'm considering ordering more as party favors. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FUN FUN FUN kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute for all occasions. My kids love the idea of creating their own masterpiece. An the feel like its their own scratch-offs lol The paper is quite durable so no tearing through. Nothing bad to say.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Walls

customer_reviews.title: Where imagination and creativity are met
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is enjoying this gift so much, it allows her to use her imagination and be creative, especially during theses times. Thank hank you K. M
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn S. Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing purchase
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the item was just fine. It is just not as engaging as I had hoped. I purchased it for my 11 year old granddaughter who lost interest after 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: cheri rolnick

customer_reviews.title: A nice gift for those who love crafts and drawing.
customer_reviews.text: My youngest granddaughter loves crafts and loves to draw so when I saw this product I thought it would make a nice gift for her for one of her Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Judy from NC

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it!
customer_reviews.text: The kids loved it. I might consider finding a cheaper brand, since the kids go thru it quickly, but if you want a good brand, then I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: You need to know that all the pages are rainbow drops of the same size and color.
customer_reviews.text: Once my Grandaughter understood the all the information, it then became fun. It isn't like other scratch off books! It makes it more creative and challenging for them.
customer_reviews.author: Sister

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Was a birthday gift for a 7 year old girl. The birthday girl was beyond excited and started drawing pretty pictures on the rainbow paper as soon as she got it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great for car trips
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's children. They are taking a two week car trip shortly, and I put together a trip surprise bag for them. My daughter said her kids are looking forward to using them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Davita-Rauch

customer_reviews.title: Put these in my kids Easter baskets and they loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, can be messy if your kids get crazy with it so I have mine put a dish towel under it while they’re at the kitchen table. Mine liked it so much I bought them other kits from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for boys and girls
customer_reviews.text: Gift item for children 3 - 9. All enjoyed using them. It was easy enough for the younger ones to draw with but the older kids had fun as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jane L.

customer_reviews.title: Good present for a child ,good price too
customer_reviews.text: It was a totally success giving this as a gift for a child. He was so excited about this rainbow scratch paper. I recommended, good price and is a nice gift for a kid who likes to draw.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Fun Product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I ordered it for a birthday gift, but doodled on the first page just to test it out and it's really cool! The only thing is that when you scratch the top material off, there's a little bit of a mess to clean up after. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this paper. It allows them to be creative and the colors that show up in the picture are a surprise every time. It’s a bit messy with the black scratching off, but you just have to sweep or vacuum it up.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A Royden

customer_reviews.title: FUN!
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids LOVED the scratch paper. The paper was in perfect condition when it arrived no scrapes. Very pleased with this item!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Beck

customer_reviews.title: Dissatified for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very lil amount for normal.size instructuon paper not what I was exspecting I thought it was larger sheets from the discription
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this. She's used it essentially daily. So much I've had to buy her a second one. Great for creative minds.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter who just turned seven LOVES this. We can sit and do drawings together. The samples included delighted her too. Excellent quality paper and plenty of tools in the package. Five 🌟's.

customer_reviews.title: No review since it hasn't been used yet.

customer_reviews.title: Great product. My Grandkids love being able to scratch ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My Grandkids love being able to scratch on the paper and these wonderful colors appear. Very creative. Thanks for a GREAT PRODUCT.

customer_reviews.text: My 2 young grandchildren loved using scratch art. We spent the whole afternoon making stories with the art.!

customer_reviews.title: Great product esp for value
customer_reviews.text: My 10yr old son loves the scratch valentines cards and it’s hard to find these scratch pads that they can creat the image and use their imagination versus a perfab image and design underneath...although the black scratch waste is slightly messy as you would assume even my 16 yr old daughter loves to create this this. Will be buying more :)
customer_reviews.author: Phillip R Riester

customer_reviews.title: Get Scratchin'!
customer_reviews.text: We love this scratchy scratch tablet. My 6 year old illustrated a story on one, and then she scraped a whole page to see what it looked like underneath. It's a great size and nicely colored. We also liked most of the stickers and bonus item. My daughter did not like the scratch and sniff banana stickers though.

customer_reviews.title: Magic paper
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product!! I bought something similar last year for kids Easter baskets. The parents raved about how this paper captivated and maintained the kids interest. So I'm back for more this year as none of the kids want store bought baskets as they don't contain the 'magic paper'.

customer_reviews.title: Very unique great gift

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun

product_meta.title: Purple Ladybug Rainbow Scratch Paper Art Kit for Kids: 20 BIG Sheets of Rainbow Scratch Off Paper in a Notepad +2 Wooden Stylus! Great Gift for Girls, Boys and Teens, Fun Arts and Crafts Activity Set!
feature_bullets: AMAZING VALUE! One spiral-bound note pad with 20 BIG, THICK pages that won't rip easily and let you draw or write, so EASY and FUN to make AMAZING ART! Plus SO MANY USES - portable scratch paper notepad means you can entertain kids or sketch on the go! All you want from a scratch paper set for kids!
IN EACH PACKAGE: 1 Scratch Notepad with 20 pages measuring 8.25" x 11", 2 stylus-style scratchers, Instructions & Ideas plus a FREE BONUS sample pack with some of our other FUN products!

FREE SAMPLE PACK INCLUDED: Free Purple Ladybug Novelty sample pack, including one sheet of Super Scent stickers, 2 sheets of assorted reward stickers, one small sheet of rainbow scratch paper with mini scratcher, and one 3D Puffy sticker sheet - Enjoy!

LET YOUR CREATIVE SPIRIT SHINE! Use the scratcher to scratch away the black matte surface of the paper, revealing the brilliant rainbow colors beneath! Makes an excellent arts and kit for kids! Also makes a great gift!!

YOUR SATISFACTION, GUARANTEED: Beware of fakes, the Purple Ladybug logo on the notepad and buying from an authorized seller is your guarantee of Purple Ladybug Novelty quality; If you're not completely satisfied with anything you get from us, contact us and we'll make it right, guaranteed!
